transformed_texts:
The Catholic Church needs to change some things.  Many people are leaving because the Church is not accepting of some things.  

The Church does not allow gay marriage, abortion, or birth control. These are strong views.  Some people think these views are old.  

If the Church changed its views, it might keep more people. Some people disagree with the Church on these subjects. They think the Church is wrong.

The Church is against abortion. People who support abortion might not want to follow a Church that says abortion is wrong. The same is true for gay marriage.

I think priests can be married. Priests say they are married to God. But everyone else has a job and a family. Priests can have both.

I agree with gay marriage. People are born different. It is not a choice. Gay people should not be punished for who they are. Men and women can get married. Two people of the same sex should be able to marry. I think it is wrong to say they cannot. I have not thought much about this topic. But it seems wrong to say gay people cannot marry. 

It is like being born straight or gay. People do not choose this. I was born straight. Other people are born gay. It is not a choice.  People should not be punished for who they are.

I do not think the government should be involved. It is not a legal problem. It is not a moral problem. People should be free to marry who they want. 

It is hard to talk about. I do not think the government should say what people can and cannot do. It is not a problem for the country. It is a private matter.

Many people think gay marriage is wrong. They say it will hurt families. But gay love is like family love. Gay couples want the same things: love, care, and support. 

Gay couples want legal rights. They want to share health care and make decisions for each other. They want to be treated equally.  

Some people say gay marriage is against their religion. They think the government should not make laws about marriage. But the government makes laws for everyone. 

Gay couples are not asking for special treatment. They want the same rights as everyone else. 

Some people worry about children raised by gay parents. But studies show that children of gay parents are happy and healthy. They need love and support, just like all children.

The government should support all families. Gay marriage is fair and just.

I work in a hospital pharmacy. I see drugs every day. Some drugs are illegal. This does not mean they are bad. Some illegal drugs can help people. 

I think marijuana is a good example. Some people say marijuana is bad. They say it is dangerous. But I think marijuana can help people. Doctors use some drugs that are illegal. They use them to help people feel better.  We should not say a drug is bad just because it is illegal. 

I think marijuana is different from alcohol. Alcohol can be bad if you use too much. Marijuana can be bad too if you use too much. But marijuana is not as bad as alcohol.

We should be careful with marijuana. It should not be legal for everyone. We should start slowly. Let people use marijuana for medicine first. Then, maybe, it can be legal for other uses.

People think marijuana is bad because it is illegal. But marijuana is not as bad as other drugs. We should not be afraid of it.

The church has change. It is not as strict now. I went to church every Sunday when I was young. I would wear a dress, shoes, and a purse. I went to a private school. I saw my friends there on the weekends. We would go to church. Now, there is a mass for teenagers. It is thirty minutes. People dress more casually. In summer, people come in beach clothes. Families run in late.  Morning mass is more casual now. People wear jeans and khakis. I think this is the biggest change. 

I do not know about church politics. But that is my church.


Regarding the bad things priests have done, I do not think they could have been stopped. Some married men are bad. They like young children. Marriage does not stop this. Priests choose to be priests. Some religions allow priests to be married. If they want to be married and practice their faith, they can join a different religion.

I think being bad is sometimes in a person's genes. People are born this way. It is not because of how they are raised. It might be different in this case, but I think genes are important. Marriage does not hide this. It might come out. The church could not stop this from happening. If they knew and covered it up, that is wrong. But I do not think they always knew.

I not like the Iraq War. The leaders said the war was about the September 11 attacks. They said Saddam Hussein had bad weapons. This was not true. The leaders lied. 

Colin Powell, a leader in the government, gave a talk at the United Nations. Now he says he did not believe the leaders. This is bad. 

The leaders do not care about the rules of our country. They want to go to war all the time.

The leaders of the country wanted to go to war in Iraq before they started. 

The son of a former leader wanted to hurt Saddam Hussein. He also wanted more energy from Iraq.

The Iraq War is too long.

If we leave Iraq now, there will be a civil war. More people will die.

The United Nations wants other countries to help in Iraq. This might make more problems. 

Many groups want to control Iraq. They fight with each other. The Parliament does not work well.

The War in Iraq is hard to understand. We did not declare war. 

It seems like a way to get back at Iraq for the attacks on September 11. 
I am not a big supporter of the war. I do not know many details.

I think we are there to build democracy and get oil. 

Staying there makes people angry. Building democracy takes time. If we leave, they will be angry because they have to start over.

I think the war should continue. 

I do not think it is fair. We should not call it a war. We use guns to show we are strong. 

Congress did not declare war. It is not a real war. 

We should help Iraq, but we are wasting money. President Bush looks bad because of the war.

The Vietnam War was also undeclared. It is now called a bad war. People say President Bush will be remembered for this war.

Many families have sons and daughters in Iraq. I want them to come home.

Iraq is dangerous.  Children cannot go to school. People fight because of their beliefs.

We should not try to change Iraq. They have a different culture.

If we stay, they will hate us more. We should let Iraq be itself.

The war will continue for a long time.

I not think it right to make this legal. I not think a state should say it is legal. I think it should be up to the churches. The Constitution says there should be separation of church and state. It is clear. 

I think trying to make this legal is against the Constitution. It is written in the Constitution. I think people who want to make this illegal are choosing one church's beliefs over others. Many Catholics and Christians are against this. 

Separation of church and state is important. It allows for religious freedom in the United States. 

Making an amendment about this would be wrong. It would go against the Constitution. It would be one of the few amendments that restricts people rather than the government. 

I do not think the government should be involved in this. I do not see why someone would want an amendment about this. It seems like a personal belief. The president should not choose one religion over others. 

I think churches should decide, not the government. There is no good reason to have an amendment about this. It will not help the economy or society.

The war in Iraq is a big problem.  The government did not tell people the truth about why we went to war. They said the war was about the September 11 attacks. This is not true. The government made people afraid and angry. They used this to start the war. The war began in 2003. 

I do not like war. I do not like fighting first. The war in Iraq is like the war in Vietnam. The government should learn from past mistakes. Many American soldiers died in Iraq.  

The government took over Iraq. They removed the government. They did not plan for what would happen next. There was a lot of fighting and chaos. The government tried to help Iraq make a new government.

This is like what happened in Vietnam. America tried to help Vietnam become a democracy. This was hard. It is hard to fight a war when the people you are fighting are citizens. 

The government should have known this would be difficult. The government did not plan well. We are still in Iraq. Many American soldiers are still dying. 

The government made it seem like the war would be easy. It is not easy to build a new government. It takes a long time. 

It is hard to know what to do. We started the war. We cannot just leave. But we cannot keep fighting forever. How many soldiers must die?

Why did we attack Iraq? Why not other countries? 

Maybe it is about the oil. 

The government said Iraq had weapons of mass destruction. They did not find any.

I support gay marriage. I have always. I think it is a private choice. It is in people's genes, not their choices. To not give people rights because of this is wrong. It is not fair.

Politics should not control this. It is a private matter. It is between two people. In my neighborhood, there are gay couples. They live like other families. They walk dogs and are happy.

I think the government should not say what marriage is. It should be a private choice.

I have read that gay people are born this way. It is in their genes. It is not a choice.

It is unfair that gay people cannot marry. A man and a woman can marry easily. But if two men or two women want to marry, it is a big deal. I think it should be a private matter.

The internet is for everyone. When you put things on the internet, they are public. You cannot take things back.

As a resident assistant, I have seen this. If you post bad things on the internet, people will see them. If you talk about hurting people or doing bad things, someone will tell.

The school must act if they see something bad. They cannot ignore it. If something bad happens, the school could be in trouble.

Sometimes people joke online. But it is hard to know what is a joke and what is serious.

At my school, someone said something bad. Someone else heard it and told the school. The school looked at the person's Facebook page. There were things on the page that made the school worried.

The person may have meant the things as a joke. But in this situation, they were serious.

When you put things on the internet, there is no privacy. If you do not want people to see it, do not post it.

The school should not look at students' social media pages. But if someone tells the school about something bad, they must act.

It is not good for teachers to be friends with students on social media. It is not right.

The war has gone on for too long.  

At first, the goal was good.  The goal was to help a country get democracy. But now, I think we forget that goal. We fight just to show we are strong.

Maybe the reasons for the war were not good. George Bush's father had problems with Saddam Hussein before.

If the goal was to help a country with no fair government, that was a good reason. If there were other reasons, it was not fair.

We showed our strength in the first few months.  We did not need to fight for many years. 

If our goal was to give democracy to a country with a bad leader, that is a good reason to fight. But our reason to fight has changed. We fight just to fight. We want to win, but we do not have a clear goal.

The war has gone on long enough. The people in that country must fight for themselves. We spend too much money on the war. We have problems at home, like poverty. We should spend the money on these problems.

We spend billions of dollars on war. We should spend this money on other things, like schools, roads, and health care.

Our citizens die in a war that is no longer needed. We should stop the war.

A person asked if looking at Myspace profiles to stop a bad thing was okay. 

I think it is okay. If a person puts things on the internet, many people can see it. On Myspace, a person must be a friend to see a profile. 

If you are friends with someone, you give them permission to see your profile.

It is hard to watch everyone's profile. This would be unfair. 

It is good if someone sees something bad and stops it.

But it is bad if someone looks at profiles randomly.

I have a Facebook, and it worries me that people I do not know can see things about me.

I saw a news story about a man who found a girl's name on Facebook and talked to her. He met her quickly.

I would not meet someone like that. Some people in my class message me, and I do not know them. They know my name and my class. They know my friends and where I am.

I try to limit what I put on Facebook. I want to talk to my friends, but it is hard to be safe.

My roommate said her high school banned Myspace. I think this is strange.

I do not think the school can tell students what they can do on the internet.

I feel bad to talk about this. Many people say they were against the Iraq War from the start. I do not like to join them. It does not matter now. Most people think the war was a bad idea. This is true in the United States, Iraq, and around the world. Many Iraqi people and U.S. soldiers think the war was wrong.  

The war has been bad from the start. Leaving will also be hard. It is hard to do anything well in the Middle East. The United States and the Middle East have very different ways. The government thinks it can bring democracy to the Middle East. But this is not the way people there want to live. 

Saddam Hussein was a bad person. But we should think about the good and bad before invading a country. The war was a mistake.

I do not know why we should stay. The government may have good reasons. But I have not heard any good reasons.

If we leave slowly, I will not be upset. But I think we should leave now. Many Iraqi people want us to leave. They know what is best for their country.  Maybe we should ask them what they want. If they say leave, we can say we tried to help. 

We will never be good guys in the Middle East. But leaving will be better than staying.

Gender difference is still a problem in the United States. It is not just women. Men also see difference.  Women face a glass roof. Even with equality, it is hard for men to work for a woman. This is because society has been this way for a long time. Women often qualify for jobs. But they may not get promoted because people think women are not in charge. The same is true for men.

Men stay at home less often.  People think men should work and be the money maker.  This can be hard for men who want to stay home.  Sometimes men in fashion are not taken seriously. People think fashion is for women.

In many jobs, there is still gender difference. To change this is hard. Society has strong ideas. Things have changed a lot since the 1800s. But change is slow. More women are in high jobs. More people accept this. More men stay home. People see that this can work well.

To change ideas, we must show the good in people. We must not be pushy. If we force change, people resist. We are making progress. Change takes time.

My idea is that they did not legalize it. They made it less serious.  This means it is no longer a crime. It is more like a ticket for a traffic rule. You might get a ticket instead of going to jail. I think if someone gets a ticket for this, it might still be bad for jobs and other things. 

Some people worry about this. Even though it is less serious, it can still be bad for jobs and other things. But it costs a lot of money to put people in jail. It costs a lot to keep them there and to bring them to court. 

Some towns do not want to spend this money. They do not like marijuana. But in some towns, people are more open to marijuana. They think it is okay. In these towns, they can use the money saved to help people. They can help with schools, old people, and people who do not have food.

It is good to be careful about marijuana. It is important to think about the money and other things too.

Some people worry that if marijuana is legal, it will be sold everywhere. People will smoke it in cars and other places. This could be bad. Marijuana is still not allowed in many places.

Alcohol is bad for driving. But marijuana can be bad for people's lives. Both are bad, but people react in different ways.

I say yes. The Church is old. They do old things. It is good to have old ways. But it is also good to change. Many Catholics go to Church every week. They have strong rules. Sometimes, I feel the Church judges people who do not follow all the rules. They do not accept people who are not perfect Catholics. They also do not accept people of other religions.

My dad was an Episcopalian. My mom was Catholic. The Church would not marry them because of my dad's religion. This is not being nice to other religions. We always learned to love others. This is a Catholic teaching. But it is wrong to say love others and not accept them.

The Church tells you to do things. But the Church does not always do these things. The Church is old. They keep doing old things. 

I think priests should be able to marry. But this will not stop bad things. Bad things happen.

I not sure about this. I not make up my mind. I can not say if one side right or wrong. But I think this is hard problem. It about church and state. It also about how we say what is marriage. This hard. We no want to hurt anyone. 

I think all civil unions good. I not know if marriage need government say what it is. Government no give tax break to people who baptized. 

If two people marry, government should see it as civil union. Two people together. Government no look at what kind of marriage. 

Gay marriage is same. Two people together. It civil union. 

If states agree, they can make it law for all states. But ban gay marriage in the constitution, that not good. Constitution for big things. This not big enough.

I grow up in a Christian home. So, homosexuality is a hard thing for me. I have gay friends. I do not agree with this way of life. But I think it should be legal. It should not be a big problem for the country. Each state should decide. 

Many states are Democratic. Many states are Republican. Democratic states want gay marriage. If you live in a Democratic state, you know how they feel. You cannot argue with that decision. You live there.  

I think gay people should have the same rights as straight people. It should be legal in each state.

I already said this. I do not think President Bush should say the whole country should not allow gay marriage. Each state should choose. I do not like his law against it.

I do not think he should make this decision for every state. He does not live in every state. He should not tell states how to run themselves. Some things should be up to each state. He will be out of office soon. If a new president wants to change the law, it will go back and forth. It should be up to each state. They are the ones who will live with the decision, not the president.

Myspace is public. It is like a bulletin for everyone to see. If you post on Myspace, other people can see it. This includes school officials. 

If school officials see something on Myspace that could prevent a school shooting, they have the right to see it.  

It is important to keep students safe. School officials have a duty to protect students. If what they see on Myspace helps them do this, it is okay.

But if they go on Myspace only to find students doing bad things, that is not okay. It is like an invasion of privacy.

You should be careful what you post on the internet. It can stay there forever. 

If you post something bad, it could come back to hurt you later.

I think it is okay for school officials to look at Myspace if they think it will help keep students safe.

The war was bad. At first, I liked the idea. I was sad after nine eleven. I wanted to go and help. I think we were too angry. We did not think about the future. We went without a plan. I think we made a mistake. I do not like the war now.

I think the people there need to fix their own problems. They fight with each other. They cannot fight with us if they fight among themselves. 

I do not care much about what happens there now. I do not think they are like us. They fight too much.

We went without thinking. We did not know what to expect. War is different there. They are not like us. They want us to leave. I think that is good.

We were too excited. We did not think about the results. We wanted revenge. The President wanted to go to war. He felt he had to.

I think he was right. We could not let them do that and then do nothing.

I think we should have had a better plan. We did not know what to do. We did not work together. We did not know why we were there.

I think we went with anger. That made things worse.

I do not think we can change them. They will always be like this. We need to leave.

I think we are hurting ourselves by staying. We have made some progress, but not enough.

We cannot stay forever. The country will collapse when we leave.

The Catholic Church needs to change some things.  Many people are leaving because the Church is not accepting of some things.  

The Church does not allow gay marriage, abortion, or birth control. These are strong views.  Some people think these views are old.  

If the Church changed its views, it might keep more people. Some people disagree with the Church on these subjects. They think the Church is wrong.

The Church is against abortion. People who support abortion might not want to follow a Church that says abortion is wrong. The same is true for gay marriage.

I think priests can be married. Priests say they are married to God. But everyone else has a job and a family. Priests can have both.

I agree with gay marriage. People are born different. It is not a choice. Gay people should not be punished for who they are. Men and women can get married. Two people of the same sex should be able to marry. I think it is wrong to say they cannot. I have not thought much about this topic. But it seems wrong to say gay people cannot marry. 

It is like being born straight or gay. People do not choose this. I was born straight. Other people are born gay. It is not a choice.  People should not be punished for who they are.

I do not think the government should be involved. It is not a legal problem. It is not a moral problem. People should be free to marry who they want. 

It is hard to talk about. I do not think the government should say what people can and cannot do. It is not a problem for the country. It is a private matter.

Many people think gay marriage is wrong. They say it will hurt families. But gay love is like family love. Gay couples want the same things: love, care, and support. 

Gay couples want legal rights. They want to share health care and make decisions for each other. They want to be treated equally.  

Some people say gay marriage is against their religion. They think the government should not make laws about marriage. But the government makes laws for everyone. 

Gay couples are not asking for special treatment. They want the same rights as everyone else. 

Some people worry about children raised by gay parents. But studies show that children of gay parents are happy and healthy. They need love and support, just like all children.

The government should support all families. Gay marriage is fair and just.

I work in a hospital pharmacy. I see drugs every day. Some drugs are illegal. This does not mean they are bad. Some illegal drugs can help people. 

I think marijuana is a good example. Some people say marijuana is bad. They say it is dangerous. But I think marijuana can help people. Doctors use some drugs that are illegal. They use them to help people feel better.  We should not say a drug is bad just because it is illegal. 

I think marijuana is different from alcohol. Alcohol can be bad if you use too much. Marijuana can be bad too if you use too much. But marijuana is not as bad as alcohol.

We should be careful with marijuana. It should not be legal for everyone. We should start slowly. Let people use marijuana for medicine first. Then, maybe, it can be legal for other uses.

People think marijuana is bad because it is illegal. But marijuana is not as bad as other drugs. We should not be afraid of it.

The church has change. It is not as strict now. I went to church every Sunday when I was young. I would wear a dress, shoes, and a purse. I went to a private school. I saw my friends there on the weekends. We would go to church. Now, there is a mass for teenagers. It is thirty minutes. People dress more casually. In summer, people come in beach clothes. Families run in late.  Morning mass is more casual now. People wear jeans and khakis. I think this is the biggest change. 

I do not know about church politics. But that is my church.


Regarding the bad things priests have done, I do not think they could have been stopped. Some married men are bad. They like young children. Marriage does not stop this. Priests choose to be priests. Some religions allow priests to be married. If they want to be married and practice their faith, they can join a different religion.

I think being bad is sometimes in a person's genes. People are born this way. It is not because of how they are raised. It might be different in this case, but I think genes are important. Marriage does not hide this. It might come out. The church could not stop this from happening. If they knew and covered it up, that is wrong. But I do not think they always knew.

I not like the Iraq War. The leaders said the war was about the September 11 attacks. They said Saddam Hussein had bad weapons. This was not true. The leaders lied. 

Colin Powell, a leader in the government, gave a talk at the United Nations. Now he says he did not believe the leaders. This is bad. 

The leaders do not care about the rules of our country. They want to go to war all the time.

The leaders of the country wanted to go to war in Iraq before they started. 

The son of a former leader wanted to hurt Saddam Hussein. He also wanted more energy from Iraq.

The Iraq War is too long.

If we leave Iraq now, there will be a civil war. More people will die.

The United Nations wants other countries to help in Iraq. This might make more problems. 

Many groups want to control Iraq. They fight with each other. The Parliament does not work well.

The War in Iraq is hard to understand. We did not declare war. 

It seems like a way to get back at Iraq for the attacks on September 11. 
I am not a big supporter of the war. I do not know many details.

I think we are there to build democracy and get oil. 

Staying there makes people angry. Building democracy takes time. If we leave, they will be angry because they have to start over.

I think the war should continue. 

I do not think it is fair. We should not call it a war. We use guns to show we are strong. 

Congress did not declare war. It is not a real war. 

We should help Iraq, but we are wasting money. President Bush looks bad because of the war.

The Vietnam War was also undeclared. It is now called a bad war. People say President Bush will be remembered for this war.

Many families have sons and daughters in Iraq. I want them to come home.

Iraq is dangerous.  Children cannot go to school. People fight because of their beliefs.

We should not try to change Iraq. They have a different culture.

If we stay, they will hate us more. We should let Iraq be itself.

The war will continue for a long time.

I not think it right to make this legal. I not think a state should say it is legal. I think it should be up to the churches. The Constitution says there should be separation of church and state. It is clear. 

I think trying to make this legal is against the Constitution. It is written in the Constitution. I think people who want to make this illegal are choosing one church's beliefs over others. Many Catholics and Christians are against this. 

Separation of church and state is important. It allows for religious freedom in the United States. 

Making an amendment about this would be wrong. It would go against the Constitution. It would be one of the few amendments that restricts people rather than the government. 

I do not think the government should be involved in this. I do not see why someone would want an amendment about this. It seems like a personal belief. The president should not choose one religion over others. 

I think churches should decide, not the government. There is no good reason to have an amendment about this. It will not help the economy or society.

The war in Iraq is a big problem.  The government did not tell people the truth about why we went to war. They said the war was about the September 11 attacks. This is not true. The government made people afraid and angry. They used this to start the war. The war began in 2003. 

I do not like war. I do not like fighting first. The war in Iraq is like the war in Vietnam. The government should learn from past mistakes. Many American soldiers died in Iraq.  

The government took over Iraq. They removed the government. They did not plan for what would happen next. There was a lot of fighting and chaos. The government tried to help Iraq make a new government.

This is like what happened in Vietnam. America tried to help Vietnam become a democracy. This was hard. It is hard to fight a war when the people you are fighting are citizens. 

The government should have known this would be difficult. The government did not plan well. We are still in Iraq. Many American soldiers are still dying. 

The government made it seem like the war would be easy. It is not easy to build a new government. It takes a long time. 

It is hard to know what to do. We started the war. We cannot just leave. But we cannot keep fighting forever. How many soldiers must die?

Why did we attack Iraq? Why not other countries? 

Maybe it is about the oil. 

The government said Iraq had weapons of mass destruction. They did not find any.

I support gay marriage. I have always. I think it is a private choice. It is in people's genes, not their choices. To not give people rights because of this is wrong. It is not fair.

Politics should not control this. It is a private matter. It is between two people. In my neighborhood, there are gay couples. They live like other families. They walk dogs and are happy.

I think the government should not say what marriage is. It should be a private choice.

I have read that gay people are born this way. It is in their genes. It is not a choice.

It is unfair that gay people cannot marry. A man and a woman can marry easily. But if two men or two women want to marry, it is a big deal. I think it should be a private matter.

The internet is for everyone. When you put things on the internet, they are public. You cannot take things back.

As a resident assistant, I have seen this. If you post bad things on the internet, people will see them. If you talk about hurting people or doing bad things, someone will tell.

The school must act if they see something bad. They cannot ignore it. If something bad happens, the school could be in trouble.

Sometimes people joke online. But it is hard to know what is a joke and what is serious.

At my school, someone said something bad. Someone else heard it and told the school. The school looked at the person's Facebook page. There were things on the page that made the school worried.

The person may have meant the things as a joke. But in this situation, they were serious.

When you put things on the internet, there is no privacy. If you do not want people to see it, do not post it.

The school should not look at students' social media pages. But if someone tells the school about something bad, they must act.

It is not good for teachers to be friends with students on social media. It is not right.

The war has gone on for too long.  

At first, the goal was good.  The goal was to help a country get democracy. But now, I think we forget that goal. We fight just to show we are strong.

Maybe the reasons for the war were not good. George Bush's father had problems with Saddam Hussein before.

If the goal was to help a country with no fair government, that was a good reason. If there were other reasons, it was not fair.

We showed our strength in the first few months.  We did not need to fight for many years. 

If our goal was to give democracy to a country with a bad leader, that is a good reason to fight. But our reason to fight has changed. We fight just to fight. We want to win, but we do not have a clear goal.

The war has gone on long enough. The people in that country must fight for themselves. We spend too much money on the war. We have problems at home, like poverty. We should spend the money on these problems.

We spend billions of dollars on war. We should spend this money on other things, like schools, roads, and health care.

Our citizens die in a war that is no longer needed. We should stop the war.

A person asked if looking at Myspace profiles to stop a bad thing was okay. 

I think it is okay. If a person puts things on the internet, many people can see it. On Myspace, a person must be a friend to see a profile. 

If you are friends with someone, you give them permission to see your profile.

It is hard to watch everyone's profile. This would be unfair. 

It is good if someone sees something bad and stops it.

But it is bad if someone looks at profiles randomly.

I have a Facebook, and it worries me that people I do not know can see things about me.

I saw a news story about a man who found a girl's name on Facebook and talked to her. He met her quickly.

I would not meet someone like that. Some people in my class message me, and I do not know them. They know my name and my class. They know my friends and where I am.

I try to limit what I put on Facebook. I want to talk to my friends, but it is hard to be safe.

My roommate said her high school banned Myspace. I think this is strange.

I do not think the school can tell students what they can do on the internet.

I feel bad to talk about this. Many people say they were against the Iraq War from the start. I do not like to join them. It does not matter now. Most people think the war was a bad idea. This is true in the United States, Iraq, and around the world. Many Iraqi people and U.S. soldiers think the war was wrong.  

The war has been bad from the start. Leaving will also be hard. It is hard to do anything well in the Middle East. The United States and the Middle East have very different ways. The government thinks it can bring democracy to the Middle East. But this is not the way people there want to live. 

Saddam Hussein was a bad person. But we should think about the good and bad before invading a country. The war was a mistake.

I do not know why we should stay. The government may have good reasons. But I have not heard any good reasons.

If we leave slowly, I will not be upset. But I think we should leave now. Many Iraqi people want us to leave. They know what is best for their country.  Maybe we should ask them what they want. If they say leave, we can say we tried to help. 

We will never be good guys in the Middle East. But leaving will be better than staying.

Gender difference is still a problem in the United States. It is not just women. Men also see difference.  Women face a glass roof. Even with equality, it is hard for men to work for a woman. This is because society has been this way for a long time. Women often qualify for jobs. But they may not get promoted because people think women are not in charge. The same is true for men.

Men stay at home less often.  People think men should work and be the money maker.  This can be hard for men who want to stay home.  Sometimes men in fashion are not taken seriously. People think fashion is for women.

In many jobs, there is still gender difference. To change this is hard. Society has strong ideas. Things have changed a lot since the 1800s. But change is slow. More women are in high jobs. More people accept this. More men stay home. People see that this can work well.

To change ideas, we must show the good in people. We must not be pushy. If we force change, people resist. We are making progress. Change takes time.

My idea is that they did not legalize it. They made it less serious.  This means it is no longer a crime. It is more like a ticket for a traffic rule. You might get a ticket instead of going to jail. I think if someone gets a ticket for this, it might still be bad for jobs and other things. 

Some people worry about this. Even though it is less serious, it can still be bad for jobs and other things. But it costs a lot of money to put people in jail. It costs a lot to keep them there and to bring them to court. 

Some towns do not want to spend this money. They do not like marijuana. But in some towns, people are more open to marijuana. They think it is okay. In these towns, they can use the money saved to help people. They can help with schools, old people, and people who do not have food.

It is good to be careful about marijuana. It is important to think about the money and other things too.

Some people worry that if marijuana is legal, it will be sold everywhere. People will smoke it in cars and other places. This could be bad. Marijuana is still not allowed in many places.

Alcohol is bad for driving. But marijuana can be bad for people's lives. Both are bad, but people react in different ways.

I say yes. The Church is old. They do old things. It is good to have old ways. But it is also good to change. Many Catholics go to Church every week. They have strong rules. Sometimes, I feel the Church judges people who do not follow all the rules. They do not accept people who are not perfect Catholics. They also do not accept people of other religions.

My dad was an Episcopalian. My mom was Catholic. The Church would not marry them because of my dad's religion. This is not being nice to other religions. We always learned to love others. This is a Catholic teaching. But it is wrong to say love others and not accept them.

The Church tells you to do things. But the Church does not always do these things. The Church is old. They keep doing old things. 

I think priests should be able to marry. But this will not stop bad things. Bad things happen.

I not sure about this. I not make up my mind. I can not say if one side right or wrong. But I think this is hard problem. It about church and state. It also about how we say what is marriage. This hard. We no want to hurt anyone. 

I think all civil unions good. I not know if marriage need government say what it is. Government no give tax break to people who baptized. 

If two people marry, government should see it as civil union. Two people together. Government no look at what kind of marriage. 

Gay marriage is same. Two people together. It civil union. 

If states agree, they can make it law for all states. But ban gay marriage in the constitution, that not good. Constitution for big things. This not big enough.

I grow up in a Christian home. So, homosexuality is a hard thing for me. I have gay friends. I do not agree with this way of life. But I think it should be legal. It should not be a big problem for the country. Each state should decide. 

Many states are Democratic. Many states are Republican. Democratic states want gay marriage. If you live in a Democratic state, you know how they feel. You cannot argue with that decision. You live there.  

I think gay people should have the same rights as straight people. It should be legal in each state.

I already said this. I do not think President Bush should say the whole country should not allow gay marriage. Each state should choose. I do not like his law against it.

I do not think he should make this decision for every state. He does not live in every state. He should not tell states how to run themselves. Some things should be up to each state. He will be out of office soon. If a new president wants to change the law, it will go back and forth. It should be up to each state. They are the ones who will live with the decision, not the president.

Myspace is public. It is like a bulletin for everyone to see. If you post on Myspace, other people can see it. This includes school officials. 

If school officials see something on Myspace that could prevent a school shooting, they have the right to see it.  

It is important to keep students safe. School officials have a duty to protect students. If what they see on Myspace helps them do this, it is okay.

But if they go on Myspace only to find students doing bad things, that is not okay. It is like an invasion of privacy.

You should be careful what you post on the internet. It can stay there forever. 

If you post something bad, it could come back to hurt you later.

I think it is okay for school officials to look at Myspace if they think it will help keep students safe.

The war was bad. At first, I liked the idea. I was sad after nine eleven. I wanted to go and help. I think we were too angry. We did not think about the future. We went without a plan. I think we made a mistake. I do not like the war now.

I think the people there need to fix their own problems. They fight with each other. They cannot fight with us if they fight among themselves. 

I do not care much about what happens there now. I do not think they are like us. They fight too much.

We went without thinking. We did not know what to expect. War is different there. They are not like us. They want us to leave. I think that is good.

We were too excited. We did not think about the results. We wanted revenge. The President wanted to go to war. He felt he had to.

I think he was right. We could not let them do that and then do nothing.

I think we should have had a better plan. We did not know what to do. We did not work together. We did not know why we were there.

I think we went with anger. That made things worse.

I do not think we can change them. They will always be like this. We need to leave.

I think we are hurting ourselves by staying. We have made some progress, but not enough.

We cannot stay forever. The country will collapse when we leave.

The Catholic Church needs to change some things.  Many people are leaving because the Church is not accepting of some things.  

The Church does not allow gay marriage, abortion, or birth control. These are strong views.  Some people think these views are old.  

If the Church changed its views, it might keep more people. Some people disagree with the Church on these subjects. They think the Church is wrong.

The Church is against abortion. People who support abortion might not want to follow a Church that says abortion is wrong. The same is true for gay marriage.

I think priests can be married. Priests say they are married to God. But everyone else has a job and a family. Priests can have both.

I agree with gay marriage. People are born different. It is not a choice. Gay people should not be punished for who they are. Men and women can get married. Two people of the same sex should be able to marry. I think it is wrong to say they cannot. I have not thought much about this topic. But it seems wrong to say gay people cannot marry. 

It is like being born straight or gay. People do not choose this. I was born straight. Other people are born gay. It is not a choice.  People should not be punished for who they are.

I do not think the government should be involved. It is not a legal problem. It is not a moral problem. People should be free to marry who they want. 

It is hard to talk about. I do not think the government should say what people can and cannot do. It is not a problem for the country. It is a private matter.

Many people think gay marriage is wrong. They say it will hurt families. But gay love is like family love. Gay couples want the same things: love, care, and support. 

Gay couples want legal rights. They want to share health care and make decisions for each other. They want to be treated equally.  

Some people say gay marriage is against their religion. They think the government should not make laws about marriage. But the government makes laws for everyone. 

Gay couples are not asking for special treatment. They want the same rights as everyone else. 

Some people worry about children raised by gay parents. But studies show that children of gay parents are happy and healthy. They need love and support, just like all children.

The government should support all families. Gay marriage is fair and just.

I work in a hospital pharmacy. I see drugs every day. Some drugs are illegal. This does not mean they are bad. Some illegal drugs can help people. 

I think marijuana is a good example. Some people say marijuana is bad. They say it is dangerous. But I think marijuana can help people. Doctors use some drugs that are illegal. They use them to help people feel better.  We should not say a drug is bad just because it is illegal. 

I think marijuana is different from alcohol. Alcohol can be bad if you use too much. Marijuana can be bad too if you use too much. But marijuana is not as bad as alcohol.

We should be careful with marijuana. It should not be legal for everyone. We should start slowly. Let people use marijuana for medicine first. Then, maybe, it can be legal for other uses.

People think marijuana is bad because it is illegal. But marijuana is not as bad as other drugs. We should not be afraid of it.

The church has change. It is not as strict now. I went to church every Sunday when I was young. I would wear a dress, shoes, and a purse. I went to a private school. I saw my friends there on the weekends. We would go to church. Now, there is a mass for teenagers. It is thirty minutes. People dress more casually. In summer, people come in beach clothes. Families run in late.  Morning mass is more casual now. People wear jeans and khakis. I think this is the biggest change. 

I do not know about church politics. But that is my church.


Regarding the bad things priests have done, I do not think they could have been stopped. Some married men are bad. They like young children. Marriage does not stop this. Priests choose to be priests. Some religions allow priests to be married. If they want to be married and practice their faith, they can join a different religion.

I think being bad is sometimes in a person's genes. People are born this way. It is not because of how they are raised. It might be different in this case, but I think genes are important. Marriage does not hide this. It might come out. The church could not stop this from happening. If they knew and covered it up, that is wrong. But I do not think they always knew.

I not like the Iraq War. The leaders said the war was about the September 11 attacks. They said Saddam Hussein had bad weapons. This was not true. The leaders lied. 

Colin Powell, a leader in the government, gave a talk at the United Nations. Now he says he did not believe the leaders. This is bad. 

The leaders do not care about the rules of our country. They want to go to war all the time.

The leaders of the country wanted to go to war in Iraq before they started. 

The son of a former leader wanted to hurt Saddam Hussein. He also wanted more energy from Iraq.

The Iraq War is too long.

If we leave Iraq now, there will be a civil war. More people will die.

The United Nations wants other countries to help in Iraq. This might make more problems. 

Many groups want to control Iraq. They fight with each other. The Parliament does not work well.

The War in Iraq is hard to understand. We did not declare war. 

It seems like a way to get back at Iraq for the attacks on September 11. 
I am not a big supporter of the war. I do not know many details.

I think we are there to build democracy and get oil. 

Staying there makes people angry. Building democracy takes time. If we leave, they will be angry because they have to start over.

I think the war should continue. 

I do not think it is fair. We should not call it a war. We use guns to show we are strong. 

Congress did not declare war. It is not a real war. 

We should help Iraq, but we are wasting money. President Bush looks bad because of the war.

The Vietnam War was also undeclared. It is now called a bad war. People say President Bush will be remembered for this war.

Many families have sons and daughters in Iraq. I want them to come home.

Iraq is dangerous.  Children cannot go to school. People fight because of their beliefs.

We should not try to change Iraq. They have a different culture.

If we stay, they will hate us more. We should let Iraq be itself.

The war will continue for a long time.

I not think it right to make this legal. I not think a state should say it is legal. I think it should be up to the churches. The Constitution says there should be separation of church and state. It is clear. 

I think trying to make this legal is against the Constitution. It is written in the Constitution. I think people who want to make this illegal are choosing one church's beliefs over others. Many Catholics and Christians are against this. 

Separation of church and state is important. It allows for religious freedom in the United States. 

Making an amendment about this would be wrong. It would go against the Constitution. It would be one of the few amendments that restricts people rather than the government. 

I do not think the government should be involved in this. I do not see why someone would want an amendment about this. It seems like a personal belief. The president should not choose one religion over others. 

I think churches should decide, not the government. There is no good reason to have an amendment about this. It will not help the economy or society.

The war in Iraq is a big problem.  The government did not tell people the truth about why we went to war. They said the war was about the September 11 attacks. This is not true. The government made people afraid and angry. They used this to start the war. The war began in 2003. 

I do not like war. I do not like fighting first. The war in Iraq is like the war in Vietnam. The government should learn from past mistakes. Many American soldiers died in Iraq.  

The government took over Iraq. They removed the government. They did not plan for what would happen next. There was a lot of fighting and chaos. The government tried to help Iraq make a new government.

This is like what happened in Vietnam. America tried to help Vietnam become a democracy. This was hard. It is hard to fight a war when the people you are fighting are citizens. 

The government should have known this would be difficult. The government did not plan well. We are still in Iraq. Many American soldiers are still dying. 

The government made it seem like the war would be easy. It is not easy to build a new government. It takes a long time. 

It is hard to know what to do. We started the war. We cannot just leave. But we cannot keep fighting forever. How many soldiers must die?

Why did we attack Iraq? Why not other countries? 

Maybe it is about the oil. 

The government said Iraq had weapons of mass destruction. They did not find any.

I support gay marriage. I have always. I think it is a private choice. It is in people's genes, not their choices. To not give people rights because of this is wrong. It is not fair.

Politics should not control this. It is a private matter. It is between two people. In my neighborhood, there are gay couples. They live like other families. They walk dogs and are happy.

I think the government should not say what marriage is. It should be a private choice.

I have read that gay people are born this way. It is in their genes. It is not a choice.

It is unfair that gay people cannot marry. A man and a woman can marry easily. But if two men or two women want to marry, it is a big deal. I think it should be a private matter.

The internet is for everyone. When you put things on the internet, they are public. You cannot take things back.

As a resident assistant, I have seen this. If you post bad things on the internet, people will see them. If you talk about hurting people or doing bad things, someone will tell.

The school must act if they see something bad. They cannot ignore it. If something bad happens, the school could be in trouble.

Sometimes people joke online. But it is hard to know what is a joke and what is serious.

At my school, someone said something bad. Someone else heard it and told the school. The school looked at the person's Facebook page. There were things on the page that made the school worried.

The person may have meant the things as a joke. But in this situation, they were serious.

When you put things on the internet, there is no privacy. If you do not want people to see it, do not post it.

The school should not look at students' social media pages. But if someone tells the school about something bad, they must act.

It is not good for teachers to be friends with students on social media. It is not right.

The war has gone on for too long.  

At first, the goal was good.  The goal was to help a country get democracy. But now, I think we forget that goal. We fight just to show we are strong.

Maybe the reasons for the war were not good. George Bush's father had problems with Saddam Hussein before.

If the goal was to help a country with no fair government, that was a good reason. If there were other reasons, it was not fair.

We showed our strength in the first few months.  We did not need to fight for many years. 

If our goal was to give democracy to a country with a bad leader, that is a good reason to fight. But our reason to fight has changed. We fight just to fight. We want to win, but we do not have a clear goal.

The war has gone on long enough. The people in that country must fight for themselves. We spend too much money on the war. We have problems at home, like poverty. We should spend the money on these problems.

We spend billions of dollars on war. We should spend this money on other things, like schools, roads, and health care.

Our citizens die in a war that is no longer needed. We should stop the war.

A person asked if looking at Myspace profiles to stop a bad thing was okay. 

I think it is okay. If a person puts things on the internet, many people can see it. On Myspace, a person must be a friend to see a profile. 

If you are friends with someone, you give them permission to see your profile.

It is hard to watch everyone's profile. This would be unfair. 

It is good if someone sees something bad and stops it.

But it is bad if someone looks at profiles randomly.

I have a Facebook, and it worries me that people I do not know can see things about me.

I saw a news story about a man who found a girl's name on Facebook and talked to her. He met her quickly.

I would not meet someone like that. Some people in my class message me, and I do not know them. They know my name and my class. They know my friends and where I am.

I try to limit what I put on Facebook. I want to talk to my friends, but it is hard to be safe.

My roommate said her high school banned Myspace. I think this is strange.

I do not think the school can tell students what they can do on the internet.

I feel bad to talk about this. Many people say they were against the Iraq War from the start. I do not like to join them. It does not matter now. Most people think the war was a bad idea. This is true in the United States, Iraq, and around the world. Many Iraqi people and U.S. soldiers think the war was wrong.  

The war has been bad from the start. Leaving will also be hard. It is hard to do anything well in the Middle East. The United States and the Middle East have very different ways. The government thinks it can bring democracy to the Middle East. But this is not the way people there want to live. 

Saddam Hussein was a bad person. But we should think about the good and bad before invading a country. The war was a mistake.

I do not know why we should stay. The government may have good reasons. But I have not heard any good reasons.

If we leave slowly, I will not be upset. But I think we should leave now. Many Iraqi people want us to leave. They know what is best for their country.  Maybe we should ask them what they want. If they say leave, we can say we tried to help. 

We will never be good guys in the Middle East. But leaving will be better than staying.

Gender difference is still a problem in the United States. It is not just women. Men also see difference.  Women face a glass roof. Even with equality, it is hard for men to work for a woman. This is because society has been this way for a long time. Women often qualify for jobs. But they may not get promoted because people think women are not in charge. The same is true for men.

Men stay at home less often.  People think men should work and be the money maker.  This can be hard for men who want to stay home.  Sometimes men in fashion are not taken seriously. People think fashion is for women.

In many jobs, there is still gender difference. To change this is hard. Society has strong ideas. Things have changed a lot since the 1800s. But change is slow. More women are in high jobs. More people accept this. More men stay home. People see that this can work well.

To change ideas, we must show the good in people. We must not be pushy. If we force change, people resist. We are making progress. Change takes time.

My idea is that they did not legalize it. They made it less serious.  This means it is no longer a crime. It is more like a ticket for a traffic rule. You might get a ticket instead of going to jail. I think if someone gets a ticket for this, it might still be bad for jobs and other things. 

Some people worry about this. Even though it is less serious, it can still be bad for jobs and other things. But it costs a lot of money to put people in jail. It costs a lot to keep them there and to bring them to court. 

Some towns do not want to spend this money. They do not like marijuana. But in some towns, people are more open to marijuana. They think it is okay. In these towns, they can use the money saved to help people. They can help with schools, old people, and people who do not have food.

It is good to be careful about marijuana. It is important to think about the money and other things too.

Some people worry that if marijuana is legal, it will be sold everywhere. People will smoke it in cars and other places. This could be bad. Marijuana is still not allowed in many places.

Alcohol is bad for driving. But marijuana can be bad for people's lives. Both are bad, but people react in different ways.

I say yes. The Church is old. They do old things. It is good to have old ways. But it is also good to change. Many Catholics go to Church every week. They have strong rules. Sometimes, I feel the Church judges people who do not follow all the rules. They do not accept people who are not perfect Catholics. They also do not accept people of other religions.

My dad was an Episcopalian. My mom was Catholic. The Church would not marry them because of my dad's religion. This is not being nice to other religions. We always learned to love others. This is a Catholic teaching. But it is wrong to say love others and not accept them.

The Church tells you to do things. But the Church does not always do these things. The Church is old. They keep doing old things. 

I think priests should be able to marry. But this will not stop bad things. Bad things happen.

I not sure about this. I not make up my mind. I can not say if one side right or wrong. But I think this is hard problem. It about church and state. It also about how we say what is marriage. This hard. We no want to hurt anyone. 

I think all civil unions good. I not know if marriage need government say what it is. Government no give tax break to people who baptized. 

If two people marry, government should see it as civil union. Two people together. Government no look at what kind of marriage. 

Gay marriage is same. Two people together. It civil union. 

If states agree, they can make it law for all states. But ban gay marriage in the constitution, that not good. Constitution for big things. This not big enough.

I grow up in a Christian home. So, homosexuality is a hard thing for me. I have gay friends. I do not agree with this way of life. But I think it should be legal. It should not be a big problem for the country. Each state should decide. 

Many states are Democratic. Many states are Republican. Democratic states want gay marriage. If you live in a Democratic state, you know how they feel. You cannot argue with that decision. You live there.  

I think gay people should have the same rights as straight people. It should be legal in each state.

I already said this. I do not think President Bush should say the whole country should not allow gay marriage. Each state should choose. I do not like his law against it.

I do not think he should make this decision for every state. He does not live in every state. He should not tell states how to run themselves. Some things should be up to each state. He will be out of office soon. If a new president wants to change the law, it will go back and forth. It should be up to each state. They are the ones who will live with the decision, not the president.

Myspace is public. It is like a bulletin for everyone to see. If you post on Myspace, other people can see it. This includes school officials. 

If school officials see something on Myspace that could prevent a school shooting, they have the right to see it.  

It is important to keep students safe. School officials have a duty to protect students. If what they see on Myspace helps them do this, it is okay.

But if they go on Myspace only to find students doing bad things, that is not okay. It is like an invasion of privacy.

You should be careful what you post on the internet. It can stay there forever. 

If you post something bad, it could come back to hurt you later.

I think it is okay for school officials to look at Myspace if they think it will help keep students safe.

The war was bad. At first, I liked the idea. I was sad after nine eleven. I wanted to go and help. I think we were too angry. We did not think about the future. We went without a plan. I think we made a mistake. I do not like the war now.

I think the people there need to fix their own problems. They fight with each other. They cannot fight with us if they fight among themselves. 

I do not care much about what happens there now. I do not think they are like us. They fight too much.

We went without thinking. We did not know what to expect. War is different there. They are not like us. They want us to leave. I think that is good.

We were too excited. We did not think about the results. We wanted revenge. The President wanted to go to war. He felt he had to.

I think he was right. We could not let them do that and then do nothing.

I think we should have had a better plan. We did not know what to do. We did not work together. We did not know why we were there.

I think we went with anger. That made things worse.

I do not think we can change them. They will always be like this. We need to leave.

I think we are hurting ourselves by staying. We have made some progress, but not enough.

We cannot stay forever. The country will collapse when we leave.
